title: Common Core Grade 3 Mathematics
description: Complete Common Core Grade 3 Mathematics curriculum covering all standards with structured progression through Operations, Number & Operations, Fractions, Measurement, and Geometry.
learningObjectives: Master multiplication and division concepts within 100
Understand place value and perform operations within 1000
Work with fractions as numbers on the number line
Solve problems involving measurement and area
Apply mathematical reasoning to real-world problems

tasks.title: Multiplying Digits with 5 and 10 Up to 999
tasks.description: Learn and practice multiplying digits with 5 and 10 up to 999 aligned with Common Core standard 3.OA.A.1: Interpret products of whole numbers
learningObjectives: Understand multiplying digits with 5 and 10 up to 999
Apply interpret products of whole numbers
Solve problems using grade-appropriate methods

Independent work and problem solving
